mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.money AS "money", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.status_code AS "statusCode", a.status_name AS "statusName", a.comment AS "comment", a.status AS "status", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o2 ON o2.id = a.office_id
